A_Body.App_TitlePage8pt: The official codified Cost Accounting Standards appear at 48CFR Chapter99. This Chaptermay be accessed via the website at w www.gpoaccess.gov/cfr/index.html.
A_Body.App_TitlePageLetter2: Appendix-Cost Accounting Standards Preambles and RegulationsThis Appendix is provided for the convenience of user of the looseleaf FAR. The official codified Cost Accounting Standards appear at 48 CFR 99.
A_Body.App_Outline: PartIII-Preambles Published Under the FAR System
